thread.title: Ex-NBA star Lamar Odom is alert and improving, his aunt says
thread.title_full: Ex-NBA star Lamar Odom is alert and improving, his aunt says

title: Ex-NBA star Lamar Odom is alert and improving, his aunt says
text: Ex-NBA star Lamar Odom is alert and improving, his aunt says By Associated Press | October 19, 2015 @ 2:28 pm FILE - In this Nov. 18, 2008, file photo, Los Angeles Lakers guard Kobe Bryant, right, talks with forward Lamar Odom after Odom fouled out against the Chicago Bulls during the second half of their NBA basketball game in Los Angeles. Odom, who was embraced by teammates and television fans alike for his Everyman approach to fame, was found face-down and alone Tuesday, Oct. 13, 2015, after spending four days at the Love Ranch, a legal Nevada brothel. Kobe Bryant joined Khloe Kardashian and some of Odom's childhood friends at his bedside after a Tuesday night Lakers game in Las Vegas. (AP Photo/Chris Carlson)
